headline: Lead Inspections and Compliance Specialist at U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE)
summary: Experienced Compliance Lead with a demonstrated history of working in the law enforcement industry. Skilled in Radiation Safety, Emergency Management, Physical Security, Test Writing, and Standards Compliance. Strong information technology professional with a Bachelor of Science (BS) focused in Workforce Development and Training from Southern Illinois University, Carbondale.

defaultPosition.description: Leads a team of federal inspectors and contractor subject matter experts conducting oversight and compliance inspections of detention facilities housing ICE detainees assessing the facility's compliance with the National Detention Standards of 2000, Performance Based National Detention Standards of 2008, or Performance Based National Detention Standards of 2011 for the ICE Office of Professional Responsibility, Office of Detention Oversight.
defaultPosition.title: Lead Inspections and Compliance Specialist
